name: louis kent
description: I’m a very affectionate, loving and caring person with good sense of humor. I am very romantic, passionate and full of sweet surprises, I love to have fun, which could mean a lot of different things. cuddling up to watch a good movie. Or a party with lots of friends, a game, a concert, a day out on the water or an evening walk. I am a happy person and I like being around people that enjoy life. Life is too short to not enjoy every moment we have. I love kids and animals. I am a big kid! I love many different kinds of music. I am a bit artistic and that side of me comes out in a lot of the things I do. I love weekend drives to just about anywhere to see new things, I am very spontaneous! lt would not be surprising for us to be walking along the lake or on a dock and I shove you off into the water and then jump in beside you! And I would definitely not get upset if you did the same to me..
